mn54:2.3: ajjhogāhetvā → ajjhogahetvā (bj, s1-3, km) | ajjhogāhitvā (pts1, mr)
mn54:3.14: Evaṃ kho me → evañca me (s1-3) | evaṃ me (mr)
mn54:6.4: Ahañceva → ahañce (?), anuviccāpi maṃ viññū → anuvicca viññū (bj, s1-3, pts1)
mn54:15.2: upasumbheyya → upacchubheyya (bj, pts1) | upacchūbheyya (s1-3, km) | upaccumbheyya (mr)
mn54:17.3: daheyya aññataraṃ vā aññataraṃ vā aṅgapaccaṅgaṃ → daheyya. aññataraṃ vā aṅgapaccaṅgaṃ (bj, pts1) | ḍaheyya … (s1-3)
mn54:20.1: yānaṃ vā → yānaṃ (s1-3, km, pts1), poriseyyaṃ → poroseyyaṃ (bj, pts1, mr) | oropeyya (s1-3, km)
mn54:21.18: amuko yo → asu yo (bj, pts1) | amuko (s1-3)
